QuestData.Title: Eliminate the Resistance
QuestData.Description: The Frostmane chieftain died in the initial trogg onslaught, but they've been led by a well-respected warrior ever since. Battok the Berserker was the one who organized the Frostmane retreat, the construction of the new village, and the strikes against Kharanos and the mountaineers.$B$BIf we remove Battok, the Frostmanes' organization should crumble, leaving the mountaineers free to pick off the survivors. Battok will be in the village, just east of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Battok the Berserker and 5 Frostmane Warriors in Frostmane Retreat.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find and kill Battok the Berserker?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent job, $n. With Battok dead, I'll send the signal to Captain Tharran. This should be the end of the Frostmane threat.
